Name: Strayed from the Path
Phase10Description: The Knights Penitent culled the town of Tarsarak looking for heretics. Ciniss lost his son during this purge. He hired me to hunt down some of the knights outside town and exact justice.
Phase9Description: I killed three knights outside of Tarsarak. I should return to Ciniss and tell him some manner of justice was served for his son.
Toast: After the Cathedralâ€™s purge on Tarsarak, blood will have blood.
